# Terminology

## "Rules" = `.github/instructions/`

When the user says **"rules"**, **"the rules"**, or **"check the rules"**, they are referring to the instruction files located in:

```
.github/instructions/
```

## Usage Examples

- "Check the rules" → Read relevant `.github/instructions/*.md` files
- "Add this to the rules" → Create or update a file in `.github/instructions/`
- "Does this follow the rules?" → Verify against `.github/instructions/` guidelines
